es.eucm.eadandroid.common.data.chapter.conversation.node
Class ConversationNode

java.lang.Object
  es.eucm.eadandroid.common.data.chapter.conversation.node.ConversationNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConversationNodeView, Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DialogueConversationNode, OptionConversationNode
public abstract class ConversationNode
extends Object
implements ConversationNodeView

Abstract class that comprises all the possible nodes for a conversation. Initially, two classes implement this interface: DialogueNode and OptionNode
